posts.post_title: Wanted To Buy N28 + N29 Allen & Ginter
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Chris Buckler
I only need a few cards/upgrades to finish my set, any help is greatly appreciated. I am looking to buy the following raw or graded in Good-EX condition. Please email me at bucklercards@yahoo.com
N28s 
Baseball: Bennett, Kelly and Anson
Oarsman: Teemer, Trickett
Wrestlers: Acton, Muldoon and McLaughlin
Boxers: Mitchell, Lannon and Carroll
Billards: Schaeffer

N29s
I still need many, most of mine have advanced damage. I am interested in purchasing any available.

Please email me at bucklercards@yahoo.com

Thanks, Chris
